summary.p: Extends an image to infinite size, specifying whether areas beyond its original extents are filled by repeating pixels from the edges of the image, wrapping pixels from the opposite edge of the image, or mirroring the image.

p.i: Supported by Win2D but not Windows.UI.Composition.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Border effect.
